name: Bearball war!
description:
Play as a bear, kill other bears and dont die (or if you need to do so)

Before playing, please check "how to play?" on the main menu in down-right corner.

This game has (v2):

-9 different unlockable colors, use them to flex on other bears
 like "look, I'm gold".
-7 objects (or how do I call them) which do different things
 like almost nothing or shooting.


Join our communitys to find someone to play with or report bugs you've found:
https://discord.com/invite/Xwnuzbk
https://discord.com/invite/jQx32da
